      • getSyncConfig

        public UserFederationMapperSyncConfigRepresentation getSyncConfig()
        Description copied from interface: UserFederationMapperFactory
        Specifies if mapper supports sync data from federated storage to keycloak and viceversa. Also specifies messages to be displayed in admin console UI (For example "Sync roles from LDAP" etc)
        Specified by:
